description: AccessibleContent provides a textual alternative to the presentational content it is wrapping. It utilizes the `alt` prop that is very similar in concept to the 'alt' attribute of an HTML tag. The content should be descriptive enough that a screen reader user gets the gist purely through text. Note the caveats on hiding content from screen readers. (see [PresentationContent](PresentationContent)) ```js --- type: example --- Presentational content goes here ```
title: AccessibleContent__README
